title: Mountain - Flowers Of Evil [320k MP3]
description:
Flowers of Evil is the third album by American hard rock band Mountain. It was their first live outing, with the second vinyl side consisting of material recorded on June 27, 1971 at the Fillmore East in New York City. 

Studio selections recorded September 1971 at the Record Plant, NYC

Live selections recorded on June 27, 1971 at the Fillmore East in NYC 

Track Listing [320k MP3]

Studio

    "Flowers of Evil" (West/Pappalardi/Rea) - 4:52
    "King's Chorale" (Pappalardi) - 1:04
    "One Last Cold Kiss" (Pappalardi/Collins) - 3:54
    "Crossroader" (Pappalardi/Collins) - 4:53
    "Pride and Passion" (Pappalardi/Collins) - 7:11

Live

    "Dream Sequence" - 25:03
    "Mississippi Queen" (West/Pappalardi/Laing/Rea) - 3:49


    Leslie West - guitar, vocals
    Felix Pappalardi - bass, vocals
    Corky Laing - drums, percussion
    Steve Knight - organ
